item.title: Hello SerDes
item.description:
Welcome to SerDes Lab ðŸš€

This blog focuses on high-speed serial link design and system-level analysis, including:

  • SerDes architectures, CDR, FFE, and DFE
  • System-level modeling using MATLAB and Python
  • Reproducible simulations and algorithmic exploration
  • Bridging engineering practice with knowledge monetization

The goal of SerDes Lab is to provide clear, practical, and reproducible insights
into modern high-speed I/O design.

Stay tuned.
